Santorum: s statement about Rick Perry giving a speech in 2001 where he talked about binational health insurance between Mexico and Texas.
The background information on binational: which refers to coverage that provides benefits in two countries or in a country other than the one in which an enrollee lives or works.
The existence of binational plans in Cal: where U.S. employers offer their workers a choice between receiving healthcare services exclusively in Mexico or getting standard U.S.-based coverage.
The potential benefits and concerns asso: including affordability for low-income workers and concerns about the quality of care provided by Mexican healthcare providers.
